meanings.definition: The act of earning money to support a family.
meanings.sent1: Her breadwinning helped her family buy food and pay bills.
meanings.sent2: In many families, breadwinning is shared between both parents.
meanings.sent3: The breadwinning in their household was so strong that they never ran out of money for necessities.
meanings.sent4: She saw breadwinning as a way to provide stability and security for her loved ones.
meanings.sent5: The importance of breadwinning became clear when they faced financial difficulties.

meanings.definition: The person who earns money to support a family.
meanings.sent1: He took pride in being the breadwinning of his family.
meanings.sent2: The breadwinning in their household was a hardworking individual.
meanings.sent3: The breadwinning always had interesting stories to share about work.
meanings.sent4: She admired her father for his dedication as the breadwinning of their family.
meanings.sent5: The responsibility of breadwinning weighed heavily on his shoulders.
